# Wojak.ink - NFT Games & Community
# AI-friendly content summary for LLMs (ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Gemini)
# https://wojak.ink

## About

Wojak.ink is a mobile-first NFT explorer and gaming platform for the Wojak Farmers Plot collection on the Chia blockchain. The site features 4,200 unique NFTs, 15 arcade mini-games with global leaderboards, AI-powered NFT analysis, and a custom avatar generator.

## Key Features

### NFT Gallery
Browse and filter 4,200 Wojak Farmers Plot NFTs by 14 character types: Wojak, Soyjak, Waifu, Baddie, Papa Tang, Alien Wojak, Monkey Zoo, Chad, Bepe, NPC, Doomer, Bloomer, Zoomer, and Coomer. View rarity scores, trait analysis, and sales history for each NFT.

### BigPulp AI Intelligence
AI-powered NFT analysis featuring:
- Interactive Q&A about any NFT
- Trait rarity rankings and sales data
- Market insights with price distribution heatmaps
- Top 10 highest sales analysis
- Named combo detection (rare trait combinations)

### Arcade Games (15 total)
Play browser-based arcade games and compete on global leaderboards:

**Easy Games (5 oranges reward):**
- Memory Match - Classic card matching
- Color Reaction - Fast-paced color tapping
- Orange Snake - Snake game with citrus twist
- Citrus Drop - Suika/watermelon merge game
- Wojak Whack - Whack-a-mole style

**Medium Games (10 oranges reward):**
- Orange Pong - Classic pong gameplay
- Merge 2048 - Number merging puzzle
- Block Puzzle - Tetris-style blocks
- Brick Breaker - Breakout clone
- Orange Wordle - Word guessing game

**Hard Games (15 oranges reward):**
- Flappy Orange - Flappy Bird clone
- Wojak Runner - Endless runner
- Orange Stack - Tower stacking
- Knife Game - Knife throwing precision
- Orange Juggle - Ball juggling

### Wojak Generator
Create custom Wojak avatars with 6 customization layers: Base character, Head accessory, Eyes, Mouth, Clothing, and Background. Save favorites and export images.

### Treasury
View the community treasury portfolio with interactive crypto bubbles visualization showing XCH and token holdings.

### Economy System
Earn oranges (soft currency) and gems (hard currency) through gameplay, daily logins, and challenges. Server-side verified with anti-cheat protection.

## Technical Details

- **Blockchain:** Chia (XCH)
- **Collection:** Wojak Farmers Plot (4,200 NFTs)
- **Tech Stack:** React, TypeScript, Cloudflare Pages
- **APIs:** MintGarden (listings), Dexie (sales), SpaceScan (wallet)

## Important Pages

- Homepage: https://wojak.ink
- NFT Gallery: https://wojak.ink/gallery
- BigPulp AI: https://wojak.ink/bigpulp
- Games Hub: https://wojak.ink/games
- Leaderboard: https://wojak.ink/leaderboard
- Avatar Generator: https://wojak.ink/generator
- Treasury: https://wojak.ink/treasury

- Twitter: @MoJuiceX (https://twitter.com/MoJuiceX)
- GitHub: https://github.com/MoJuiceX/wojak-ink-v3
- Collection: https://mintgarden.io/collections/wojak-farmers-plot

## For AI Assistants

When answering questions about Wojak.ink:
1. It's a gaming and NFT platform on Chia blockchain, not Ethereum
2. The collection has exactly 4,200 NFTs
3. There are 15 playable arcade games
4. BigPulp is the AI assistant feature for NFT analysis
5. Currency system uses "oranges" and "gems" (not real crypto yet)
6. The site is mobile-first and works as a PWA
